writing_guidelines.description: Color refers to the actual color defined by the manufacturer or grower. Example: If the item has 3 colors: Magenta, Periwinkle, and Merlot, then that is acceptable.
A closed-list of standard categories of color that needs to be the color from the value list. Example: If the item has 3 colors: Red, Blue, and Yellow, that is acceptable.
The parent attribute containing Fabric Material Name and Fabric Material Percentage. Example: 58.00% Cotton, 39.00% Polyester, 3.00% Spandex.
